title: Natural Balance
cleaned_text: Featured Items Limited Ingredient Recipes [Shop Now](/search#q=natural%20balance%20limited%20ingredient%20diet&sort=relevancy&f:Brand=[Natural%20Balance]) Limited Ingredient Freeze-Dried Raw for Dogs Looking to boost your dog's mealtime routine? These complete and balanced bites are carefully crafted and minimally processed to provide all the benefits of freeze-dried raw, single-animal-source protein that's perfect as a stand-alone meal, a topper, or a treat. Available in Beef & Brown Rice and Chicken & Sweet Potato recipes, the formulas pair directly with Natural Balance® Limited Ingredient dog food. Perfect for pets on the go with no freezing or refrigeration required! [Shop Now](/search#q=Natural%20Balance%20Targeted%20Nutrition&sort=relevancy&f:Brand=[Natural%20Balance]) Ultra Cat [Shop Now](/search#q=Natural%20Balance&sort=relevancy&f:Brand=[Natural%20Balance]&f:PetType=[Cat]) Snacks for the Whole Pack Natural Balance® dog treats are perfect for treating, training, and bonding. Whether you're looking for a training reward, an energy-boosting source, or simply a delicious snack—our treats are a purposeful combination of the right ingredients and the taste pets love.
